Body: I think the concept of this project is quite interesting where passengers can use platfrom to issue vouchers automatically when flight delays occur. Thus the problem of difficulty in the process of issuing vouchers will be resolved, passengers will feel their rights and compensations are responded and given immediately. Indirectly, the passenger's discontent with the airline due to flight delays can be reduced, and the benefits can also be felt by the airlines themselves.

Author: p3ppymon
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: Another misuse of the blockchain technology in my opinion. How would you tackle the real problem? Shouldn't customers affected by delayed flight contact directly the carrier in order to file a complaint? Why do you need to be the middleman? Last question: why do you need to issue a token at all? Aren't miles programmes enough to reward loyalty?

Author: 3piecechickendinner
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: Hi, the problem with contacting the airline directly is that you have to call into a call center, fill out a claim form and wait, and wait.  We are not the middleman and you don‚Äôt contact us to process the claim.  We provide the software for the airline to use which will be invisible to you.  If a user has an expiring voucher they can come to our platform to exchange that voucher to another user for our tokens.

Author: 3piecechickendinner
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: Hi, great question, our plan is to start presenting our idea to the airlines that are in the European Union and those who make flights there.  As they are regulated by EU 261.  Next, we will shift our focus to the airlines in Asia and the Middle East.  Later we will focus on Regional, National and Major airlines in the U.S.

Author: 3piecechickendinner
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS

Author: 3piecechickendinner
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: Thank you!  We appreciate the support

Author: 3piecechickendinner
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: In October 2017, there were over 400,000 delayed flights worldwide (Flightstats) so many people have experienced this issue. The beauty of this project is that users do not need to know about crypto to use this.  They will be using the technology and not even aware of it when the airlines implement into their ecosystem.  They will just know that the airline emailed them a voucher to use for their next flight.  But the underlying technology of Blockchain and smart contracts is not known to them.  But when a user wants to exchange their expiring voucher for our tokens then yes, some general knowledge of crypto is expected.  But with our adoption and awareness campaigns we will do everything we can to make sure the user is making an informed decision.

Author: Coin_trader
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: Nice explanation and statistics but what will you do to entice the airlines to adopt this project what will be their gains and what will be the other benefits of the passenger who will avail of your services?

Author: 3piecechickendinner
Title: [ANN][TRUSTABIT] BLOCKCHAIN FOR DELAYED FLIGHTS
Body: Quote what will you do to entice the airlines to adopt this project what will be their gains   Customer loyalty is the biggest point here, then reduced man hours for customer service departments as it relates to claim filing.  The airlines have to pay the money regardless in the European Union because of Regulation 261.  Because they have made this process of filing the claims so arduous, users have gone to third party companies and are paying them 25% or more to process their claims.  Which created a new market "Passenger Rights Market" that is valued at $3.3 billion dollars annually and increasing.  Quote what will be the other benefits of the passenger who will avail of your services? Twofold.  The passenger now does not have to waste time in filling out forms or calling into a call center to get their compensation.  Also many people have vouchers that end up expiring as they are only valid for one year.  Now they can come to our ecosystem and trade that expiring voucher to another user for our tokens (TAB)
